data.message: So basically for half of your core fan base, you don't care now.  Great we all bought you tunes for the last 20 years.   Can you give that all back to us is we are so vile.

replies.message: I believe he didn't say all of his fans and I do believe he didn't mean all of trump supporters but I think he means the people who are so oblivious to what's going on in politics that they have no right to even be speaking about things he may have said all my trump supporting fans but if you're a good person who mind their business and that's what they need to do in life I'm sure he wasn't talking about you. As for you asking for your money back are you joking he's never going to ever do something like that that's like an Indian giver you gave money to listen to his music and now because he offended you you want your money back go lay down somewheres

Jennifer Leanora Miller he clearly said fuck you, to me.  That's easy to do since he hasn't been relevant for years and most of his fans already bought his stuff.   Am I naive enough to really think he is gonna refund me, fuck no. But my point is that he is a dick and says what he wants after the sell has been done.  Basically he has nothing to loose.
He don't care about Yall trump supporters let him be Fuck trump

Yes Andrea Farley we understand.  Trump talks kinda  like an idiot, well actually not much different than Eminem; BUT he will likely accomplish more great economic prosperity for the poor and under privileged than any president ever before.   Don't believe everything CNN or BET tells you because they only want to keep holding you back like they have for 100's of years.
